subject: docs(claude-md): add commit message format guidelines
body:
Add structured commit metadata footer requirements to CLAUDE.md
under Hard Rules. Defines required footers: Tags, Complexity,
Urgency, Impact, Risk, Debt, Epic, and Semver.

Tags: documentation, developer-experience, standards
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 2
Impact: internal
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: commit-guidelines
Semver: patch

title: add commit message format guidelines
